name: WIP Hatched Into Plastic
description:
I'm making Hatched Into Plastic with Môsi to get the hang of the tool.

To play:

  • on computer, use the arrow keys to move
  • on mobile, swipe in the direction you want to go
  • navigate the pollution maze
  • find your mama

 To finish:

  • health variables
  • plastic facts
  • ending screen
  • nicer game page
